example.description: Inserting subnodes from file to a:tree element.
example.source: <a:tree model = "demo/xml/friends.xml" height = "150" width = "300"> <a:each match="[friend|lang]"> <a:caption match = "[@name]" /> <a:icon match = "[@icon]"/> <a:insert match = "[friend]" get = "demo/xml/friends_subnodes.xml" /> </a:each> </a:tree>

example.description: Inserting subnodes from model to a:tree element.
example.source: <a:tree model = "demo/xml/friends.xml" height = "170" width = "300"> <a:each match="[friend|lang]"> <a:caption match = "[@name]" /> <a:icon match = "[@icon]"/> <a:insert match = "[friend]" get = "{mdlExDi.data}" /> </a:each> </a:tree> <a:model id="mdlExDi"> <data> <lang icon="medal_silver_1.png" name="PHP"></lang> <lang icon="medal_silver_1.png" name="JS"></lang> </data> </a:model>

example.description: Inserting subnodes to a:tree element from file (we know which nodes have subnodes).
example.source: <a:tree model = "demo/xml/friends.xml" height = "160" width = "320"> <a:each match="[friend|lang]"> <a:caption match = "[@name]" /> <a:icon match = "[@icon]"/> <a:insert match = "[friend[@langs]]" get = "demo/getSubnodes.php?name=[@name]" /> </a:each> </a:tree>

example.description: Inserting subnodes to a:tree element from file (we don't know which nodes have subnodes).
example.source: <a:tree model = "demo/xml/friends.xml" height = "170" width = "300"> <a:each match = "[friend|lang]"> <a:caption match = "[@name]" /> <a:icon match = "[@icon]"/> <a:insert match = "[friend]" get = "demo/getSubnodes.php?name=[@name]" /> </a:each> </a:tree>
